title: connection with options / connect without credentials
author: titicocotte
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
The "connection with options"/"connect without credentials" sub-menu should open a new session window, even if a window is already open for this machine with another session...

## Current Behavior
If no window session opened, the "connect without credentials" open a new window it's ok, 
but if a window is already opened for this machine, the menu do not open a new window !

## Possible Solution

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. open a ssh session window on a li...
